column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ Two cars collided and were then hit by a train
column4: causing injuries. The incident occurred at 8:30 am on 3 December 2018 in Kbal Kong II Khan Por Senchey
column6: a light truck  “Battambang 3A-0380”  license plate had crossed the train tracks and was hit by a train. Another car “Phnom Penh 2H-6344” and a motorbike also crashed
column7: causing two motorcyclists  serious injuries. The couple were taken hospital immediately.------After the incident
column8: traffic police were seen to control traffic and take the vehicles away for legal proceedings. ------https://tvfb.news/article/16482------(function(d

column14: 'facebook-jssdk'));------ព័ត៌មានទាន់ហេតុការណ៍------ព័ត៌មានបឋម៖​ ករណីគ្រោះថ្នាក់ចរាចររថយន្តពីរគ្រឿងបុកគ្នានិងត្រូវរថភ្លើងមកបុកបន្ថែមទៀតបណ្តាលឲ្យមានអ្នករងរបួស ហេតុការណ៍នេះកើតឡើងនាវេលាម៉ោង០៨និង៣០នាទី ត្រូវនិងថ្ងៃទី០៣ ខែធ្នូ ឆ្នាំ២០១៨ ស្ថិតក្នុងសង្កាត់កាកាបទី២ ខណ្ឌពោធិ៍សែនជ័យ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ------由 ------TVFB------ 发布于 2018 年 12 月 2 日 周日
